participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and resilient, with a love for creativity and family.
participant_1.background: i've amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i can sew my own clothes. i am retired and living the great life.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, with a passion for animals and sports.
participant_2.background: i've three dogs. my father was a door to door salesman. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business.
